name: Lia Miami
description:
Lia Miami is a on rails space shooter similar to Starfox 64. The game only has one level and takes about 2-3 minutes to play. 

Download and Play Directions
Unzip file. LIaMiami -> WindowsNoEditor -> Launch Magic.exe

Controls
best played with a controller

Movement: WASD/Left Joystick
Fire Primary Weapon: RT/R2/LMB/Spacebar
Toggle Primary Weapon: Lft Ctrl/LB/L1
Fire Missile: B/Circle/Q
Lock On Missile: Hold RB/Tab/R1
Barrel Roll: X/Square/E
Boost: Y/Triangle/F
Brake: A/Cross/C
Hand Brake/Slide: RMB/Left Trigger/L2
Pause: P/Pause/Esc/Gamepad Special Right
